entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 23 April 2023
